title: Hint
text:
$$1$$. By definition, a continuous probability density function (PDF), denoted as f(x), must satisfy two properties:
(i) f(x) $$ \geq $$ $$0$$ for all $$x$$ in the domain.
(ii) The total area under f(x), over the entire real line (or the relevant domain), is $$1$$.

$$2$$. Mathematically, property (ii) is expressed as:
